    <metadata>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Kes ja mis</string>
            <string language="en">What and Who</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was und wer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui et qui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que e quem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa e chi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι και ποιοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué y quién</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Kidspiration programmiga loodud tööleht, kus õpilane peab joonistama ühe pildi, mis vastab küsimusele mis ja ühe pildi, mis vastab küsimusele kes.</string>
            <string language="en">A Kidspiration programme worksheet where student has to draw a picture that answers to a question what, and another picture to the question who</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">sõnaliigid</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kidspiration Programmbogen, wo Kursteilnehmer 
eine Abbildung zeichnen muß, die auf eine Frage beantwortet, was und 
eine andere Abbildung zur Frage die</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un tableau de programme de Kidspiration où 
l'étudiant doit dessiner une image qui répond à une question à un 
ce qui, et à une image différente à la question qui</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma folha do programa de Kidspiration onde o 
estudante tem que desenhar um retrato que responda a uma pergunta a 
que, e a um outro retrato à pergunta que</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un foglio di lavoro di programma di Kidspiration 
dove l'allievo deve dissipare un'immagine che risponde ad una domanda 
che cosa e ad un'altra immagine alla domanda che</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα φύλλο εργασίας προγράμματος Kidspiration όπου 
ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να σύρει μια εικόνα που απαντήσεις σε μια 
ερώτηση τι, και μια άλλη εικόνα στην ερώτηση που</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una hoja de trabajo del programa de Kidspiration 
donde el estudiante tiene que trazar un cuadro que conteste a una 
pregunta a lo que, y a otro cuadro a la pregunta que</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
